Thank you for your letter of August 
10, 2019 
regenfing the 
death of Jeffrey 
Epstein. Mr. 
Epstein's death is a tragedy to everyone involved in his case. 
One open question. among others, is whether the investigations 
referenced in 
your letter 
will 
include 
the 
incident at MCC 
involving Mr. 
Epstein on or about July 23. 
2019. To my 
knowledge, it has never been 
definitively explained what the BOP concluded about that incident.
